topic.title: YARN Settings
topic.shortdesc: YARN (or MapReduce2) is the default resource management/computation framework in CDH5. It is deployed as part of the core Hadoop components set when you install Cloudera Manager.

body.p: Cloudera Manager generates the necessary configuration files at installation time.
Once Cloudera services have been installed, some default settings need to be adjusted for best performance. We recommend the settings in below as a starting point.

row.entry: Amount of physical memory, in MiB, that can be allocated for containers.
